title: 🎯 Diving
description:
◣◥  New Syllabus Challenge!

🎯 Diving

Vaulting Challenge - Cat-Pass 8

Using a bag or any item that is knee-height or greater, place it three steps in front of a hip-height wall. 

You need to demonstrate a diving cat-pass over the lower item and over the main wall. You entire body needs to be in the air for a moment. As you jump and your feet leave the ground, your hands must not be touching the wall yet.

You hands must land flat on the palm and there must not be any twisting in the movement. 

Repeat five times, not touching the knee-height item. 

-- Rules of Challenge --

Rule 1 description : The height of the wall must be hip-height or greater.
Rule 2 description : The height of the obstacle to dive over must be knee-height or greater.
Rule 3 description : The knee-height obstacle must be three steps ahead of the main wall.
Rule 4 description : Both sides must be performed. No twisting
Rule 5 description : Five repetitions.
Rule 6 description : Any landing is acceptable.
Rule 7 description : Any Takeoff is acceptable.
Rule 8 description : The hands should be in a flat position, with the full palm touching. No steepled fingers or thumb tucked behind, raising the palm.
